page_2.posted_on: 27 days ago as per the 2024-12-30 14:49:38 or None
page_2.job_description:
Job Description 
 We are seeking a talented and creative UI/UX Designer to join our team. As a UI/UX Designer, you will be responsible for translating user requirements into visually appealing and intuitive user interfaces. Your expertise in creating wireframes, storyboards, process flows, and sitemaps will be instrumental in delivering exceptional user experiences for our products. 
 
 Responsibilities: 
 Design Conceptualization: Utilize wireframes, storyboards, process flows, and sitemaps to visualize and communicate design ideas effectively. 
 Collaboration: Work closely with product managers and engineers to deeply understand the products purpose and functionalities, and present well-thought-out solutions to enhance the visual and interactive experience. 
 User Requirements Gathering: Gather user requirements from product managers and conduct research to develop compelling and original designs, including images and wireframes. 
 UI Design Implementation: Build and design user interfaces using agreed design systems in Figma/Adobe XD, ensuring a consistent and cohesive look and feel across the product. 
 UX Troubleshooting: Identify and troubleshoot UX problems through user testing and feedback, and implement improvements accordingly. 
 Design Presentations: Present design concepts and ideas to colleagues, executive members, and clients, explaining the rationale behind your design decisions. 
 Brand Consistency: Ensure that design elements, such as style, fonts, colors, and images, adhere to established brand guidelines and maintain a high standard of consistency. 
 User Experience Research: Conduct regular research on user experience trends, industry best practices, and emerging technologies to stay updated and continuously improve design processes. 
 Feedback Integration: Gather and incorporate feedback from stakeholders and users to iteratively enhance the user interface and experience. 
 Industry Trends: Stay informed about the latest UI/UX design trends, tools, and techniques, bringing fresh ideas and insights to the team. 
 
 
 Requirements: 
 Proven Experience: A portfolio showcasing your experience in UI/UX design and a track record of creating engaging and user-centric designs. 
 Design Tools: Proficiency in using design tools like Figma, Adobe XD, Sketch, or similar software. 
 Creativity: Strong creative and artistic abilities with a keen eye for aesthetics and attention to detail. 
 Communication: Excellent communication and presentation skills to articulate design concepts and collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. 
 Problem-Solving: Ability to identify and solve UX/UI challenges with innovative and practical solutions. 
 User-Centric Mindset: Deep understanding of user behavior and the ability to create user-centered designs. 
 Adaptability: Capacity to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and manage multiple projects simultaneously. 
 Continuous Learning: A proactive attitude towards learning and staying up-to-date with UI/UX trends and advancements. 
 
 If you are a passionate UI/UX Designer with a focus on delivering exceptional user experiences through innovative designs, we invite you to join our team. Contribute your creativity and skills to shape our products and leave a positive impact on our users.

page_2.job_description:
FCM India is a leading travel management company providing innovative, technology-driven solutions. We specialize in delivering personalized business travel experiences, ensuring seamless travel for clients worldwide. 
 [bold] Job Purpose: Job Purpose: 
 The MICE Operations (Visa) Documentation Specialist will manage visa documentation for delegates attending MICE (Meetings, Incentives, Conferences, and Exhibitions) events. This role ensures timely and accurate processing of visa documentation to facilitate smooth travel for attendees. 
 [bold] Key Responsibilities: Key Responsibilities: [bold] Visa Documentation: Visa Documentation: 
 Prepare and manage visa applications and supporting documents for delegates attending MICE events. Coordinate with embassies, consulates, and external agencies to ensure timely visa approval. Track visa application status and inform delegates of any updates 
 [bold] Client Liaison: Client Liaison: 
 Communicate visa requirements and updates to clients and delegates. Provide guidance on required documentation and address any concerns regarding visa processes. 
 [bold] Record Keeping: Record Keeping: 
 Maintain accurate and organized records of visa applications, statuses, and approvals. Generate and share reports on the visa process and outcomes. 
 [bold] Compliance and Process Improvement: Compliance and Process Improvement: 
 Ensure adherence to visa regulations and FCM India policies. Identify opportunities for streamlining the documentation process to minimize delays. 
 [bold] Key Requirements: Key Requirements: 
 [bold] Education: Education: 
 Graduate in Travel & Tourism or related field. 
 [bold] Experience: Experience: 
 Previous experience with embassies or consulates is advantageous. 
 [bold] Skills & Competencies: Skills & Competencies: 
 Strong communication skills (written and verbal). Detail-oriented with excellent organizational skills. Knowledge of global visa regulations and documentation requirements. Ability to manage multiple tasks and meet deadlines efficiently. Proficiency in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel). Experience with travel management software is a plus. 
 [bold] Preferred: Preferred: 
 Knowledge of MICE event documentation and travel logistics. Familiarity with international travel regulations.

Some careers open more doors than others. If you re looking for a career that will unlock new opportunities,  join HSBC and experience the possibilities.  Whether you want a career that could take you to the top,  or simply take you in an exciting new direction,  HSBC offers opportunities,  support and rewards that will take you further. Business Banking Business Banking provides financial services solutions that support businesses ranging from small corporates to mid-market enterprises in a variety of industry sectors all over the world.  Leveraging the strength,  scope and expertise of our global product network,  Business Banking is positioned as an essential partner to small and mid-market enterprises seeking to maximise their potential domestically and internationally,  offering streamlined business access to HSBC s international network and broad range of market leading banking products and services. We are currently seeking a CA Intern to join Business Banking Team in Mumbai Principal Responsibilities The role would require to work closely with BB Associate Relationship Managers & Relationship Managers in preparing credit proposals,  legal documentation,  controls/compliance monitoring and liaising within HSBC network and also work on various MIS for internal/external regulatory purpose and due diligence process.

Personal data held by the Bank relating to employment applications will be used in accordance with our Privacy Statement,  which is available on our website.

page_2.posted_on: 3 days ago as per the 2024-12-30 14:53:39 or None
page_2.job_description:
Job Summary 
 
 
 WN Infotech is seeking an experienced Cloud Compute Engineer to design,  deploy,  and maintain cloud-based infrastructure that powers our applications and services.  In this role,  you will be responsible for managing cloud resources,  optimizing compute instances,  and ensuring the scalability,  security,  and performance of our cloud environments.  As a Cloud Compute Engineer,  you will play a critical role in architecting solutions that leverage cloud-native capabilities to support high-demand applications,  automated workflows,  and efficient resource management. This role involves a strong focus on cloud infrastructure automation,  cost optimization,  and performance tuning.  You will collaborate closely with DevOps,  security,  and software development teams to implement best practices in cloud computing,  ensuring that infrastructure meets business requirements and complies with industry standards.  This is an ideal opportunity for a proactive engineer with a deep understanding of cloud technologies,  infrastructure as code,  and high-performance computing. 
 
 Your Role and Responsibilities 
 
 [bold] Cloud Architecture and Design: Cloud Architecture and Design: Design and implement cloud compute infrastructure that supports scalable and resilient applications,  leveraging cloud-native services and best practices. [bold] Compute Optimization: Compute Optimization: Analyze and optimize compute instances for performance,  scalability,  and cost-effectiveness,  managing resources efficiently across platforms such as AWS,  Azure,  or Google Cloud. [bold] Infrastructure as Code (IaC): Infrastructure as Code (IaC): Use IaC tools like Terraform,  CloudFormation,  or Ansible to automate cloud infrastructure provisioning and management,  ensuring consistency and repeatability. [bold] Automation and Orchestration: Automation and Orchestration: Develop and implement automation for cloud operations,  reducing manual intervention and streamlining deployments. [bold] Monitoring and Performance Tuning: Monitoring and Performance Tuning: Establish monitoring,  logging,  and alerting for cloud environments,  proactively addressing performance issues and ensuring system reliability. [bold] Security and Compliance: Security and Compliance: Implement security measures across cloud infrastructure,  ensuring compliance with regulatory standards (e. g. ,  GDPR,  HIPAA) and best practices for cloud security. [bold] Collaboration with Development Teams: Collaboration with Development Teams: Work closely with development and DevOps teams to align cloud infrastructure with application needs,  supporting continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD) pipelines. [bold] Documentation and Process Improvement: Documentation and Process Improvement: Document cloud architectures,  workflows,  and best practices,  and contribute to continuous improvement of infrastructure processes. 
 
 
 Required Technical and Professional Expertise 
 
 [bold] Cloud Platforms Expertise: Cloud Platforms Expertise: Strong experience with cloud platforms such as AWS,  Azure,  or Google Cloud,  with knowledge of core services including compute,  storage,  networking,  and security. [bold] Infrastructure as Code (IaC): Infrastructure as Code (IaC): Proficiency in using IaC tools like Terraform,  CloudFormation,  or Ansible to automate infrastructure management. [bold] Scripting and Automation: Scripting and Automation: Experience with scripting languages like Python,  Bash,  or PowerShell to automate cloud tasks and configurations. [bold] Performance Optimization: Performance Optimization: Skills in tuning cloud environments for high performance and efficiency,  with experience in managing resources,  scaling,  and cost management. [bold] CI/CD and DevOps Principles: CI/CD and DevOps Principles: Familiarity with CI/CD tools (e. g. ,  Jenkins,  GitLab CI/CD,  GitHub Actions) and an understanding of DevOps practices to support agile deployments. [bold] Monitoring and Logging: Monitoring and Logging: Knowledge of monitoring tools (Prometheus,  Grafana,  CloudWatch) and logging systems for proactive infrastructure management. [bold] Networking and Security: Networking and Security: Understanding of cloud networking concepts,  VPNs,  firewalls,  and encryption practices to ensure secure and resilient infrastructure. [bold] Database Management (Optional): Database Management (Optional): Experience in managing cloud-based databases (e. g. ,  RDS,  Cloud SQL) is a plus. 
 
 
 
 Qualification & Experience Required 
 
 [bold] Educational Background: Educational Background: Bachelor s or Master s degree in Computer Science,  Information Technology,  or a related field. [bold] Experience: Experience: Freshers with relevant academic projects or internships in cloud computing are encouraged to apply. Experienced candidates should have 3+ years in cloud infrastructure engineering,  DevOps,  or cloud systems management. [bold] Certifications (Preferred): Certifications (Preferred): AWS Certified Solutions Architect,  Google Professional Cloud Architect,  or Microsoft Azure Administrator.
